title: AdaptiveMediaSource on Windows 1803 not playing SmoothStreaming
body: On Windows 1802 compilation 17134 AdaptativeMediaSource is not able to play SmoothStreaming.

comments.body:
Boris, I'll connect with you offline, but if you are using the V2 Live Channels, we only supported Smooth Streaming format on the Preview Endpoints. The preview in Azure Media Services "Channels" in v2 did not have the capability to do dynamic packaging.
This works fine if you use the AMP player, which will flip over to Flash and Smooth playback in a browser, but since you are using Windows UWP, you need to make sure that you are on the right version where Smooth Streaming is exposed on the Adaptive Stream source. I think that this was added post RS4.
